channel.title: welcome to my world • Posts by "web开发" category
channel.category: C语言大一上学期期末复习

item.title: Vue框架 小作品
自主作品2
item.description: <h2 id="作业"><a class="markdownIt-Anchor" href="#作业">#</a> 作业</h2> <figure class="highlight html"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;viewport&quot;</span> <span class="attr">content</span>=<span class="string">&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">title</span>&gt;</span>作品20230806<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">title</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">head</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">body</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">id</span>=<span class="string">&quot;h1&quot;</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;../图床/1.jpg&quot;</span> <span class="attr">width</span>=<span class="string">&quot;250px&quot;</span>&gt;</span> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">&lt;!-- 两个按键 --&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;button&quot;</span> <span class="attr">value</span>=<span class="string">&quot;情景1&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onclick</span>=<span class="string">&quot;qj1()&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;button&quot;</span> <span class="attr">value</span>=<span class="string">&quot;情景2&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onclick</span>=<span class="string">&quot;ntm()&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">&lt;!-- 定义一个输入框 --&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;text&quot;</span> <span class="attr">id</span>=<span class="string">&quot;kk&quot;</span> <span class="attr">value</span>=<span class="string">&quot;LUOZIFENG&quot;</span> <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;自由输入&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onfocus</span>=<span class="string">&quot;lower()&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onblur</span>=<span class="string">&quot;upper()&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">&lt;!-- 定义是三个复选框 --&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;checkbox&quot;</span> <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;hobby&quot;</span>&gt;</span>电影<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span> </span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;checkbox&quot;</span> <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;hobby&quot;</span>&gt;</span>旅游<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;checkbox&quot;</span> <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;hobby&quot;</span>&gt;</span>游戏<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">label</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">&lt;!-- 定义两个按键 --&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;button&quot;</span> <span class="attr">value</span>=<span class="string">&quot;全选&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onclick</span>=<span class="string">&quot;allon()&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">input</span> <span class="attr">type</span>=<span class="string">&quot;button&quot;</span> <span class="attr">value</span>=<span class="string">&quot;反选&quot;</span> <span class="attr">onclick</span>=<span class="string">&quot;allup()&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">body</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">script</span>&gt;</span><span class="language-javascript"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="comment">//通过id获取对象</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">var</span> imgs=<span class="variable language_">document</span>.<span class="title function_">getElementById</span>(<span class="string">&#x27;h1&#x27;</span>);</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">qj1</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> imgs.<span class="property">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;../图床/2.jpg&quot;</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">ntm</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> imgs.<span class="property">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;../图床/3.jpg&quot;</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">var</span> low=<span class="variable language_">document</span>.<span class="title function_">getElementById</span>(<span class="string">&#x27;kk&#x27;</span>);</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="comment">//设置小写状态</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">lower</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> </span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> low.<span class="property">value</span>=low.<span class="property">value</span>.<span class="title function_">toLowerCase</span>();</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="comment">//设置大写状态</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">upper</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> low.<span class="property">value</span>=low.<span class="property">value</span>.<span class="title function_">toUpperCase</span>();</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="comment">//设置选中状态</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">allon</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">var</span> kuangs=<span class="variable language_">document</span>.<span class="title function_">getElementsByName</span>(<span class="string">&quot;hobby&quot;</span>);</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">for</span> (<span class="keyword">let</span> i = <span class="number">0</span>; i &lt; kuangs.<span class="property">length</span>; i++) &#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> kuangs[i].<span class="property">checked</span>=<span class="literal">true</span>;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title function_">allup</span>(<span class="params"></span>)&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">var</span> kuangs=<span class="variable language_">document</span>.<span class="title function_">getElementsByName</span>(<span class="string">&quot;hobby&quot;</span>);</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> <span class="keyword">for</span> (<span class="keyword">let</span> i = <span class="number">0</span>; i &lt; kuangs.<span class="property">length</span>; i++) &#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> kuangs[i].<span class="property">checked</span>=<span class="literal">false</span>;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-javascript"></span><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">script</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">html</span>&gt;</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure>

item.title: 模仿新浪网的一个作品
item.description: <p>学了前端开发两天半，写了第一个网页设计作品</p> <figure class="highlight html"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">33</span><br><span class="line">34</span><br><span class="line">35</span><br><span class="line">36</span><br><span class="line">37</span><br><span class="line">38</span><br><span class="line">39</span><br><span class="line">40</span><br><span class="line">41</span><br><span class="line">42</span><br><span class="line">43</span><br><span class="line">44</span><br><span class="line">45</span><br><span class="line">46</span><br><span class="line">47</span><br><span class="line">48</span><br><span class="line">49</span><br><span class="line">50</span><br><span class="line">51</span><br><span class="line">52</span><br><span class="line">53</span><br><span class="line">54</span><br><span class="line">55</span><br><span class="line">56</span><br><span class="line">57</span><br><span class="line">58</span><br><span class="line">59</span><br><span class="line">60</span><br><span class="line">61</span><br><span class="line">62</span><br><span class="line">63</span><br><span class="line">64</span><br><span class="line">65</span><br><span class="line">66</span><br><span class="line">67</span><br><span class="line">68</span><br><span class="line">69</span><br><span class="line">70</span><br><span class="line">71</span><br><span class="line">72</span><br><span class="line">73</span><br><span class="line">74</span><br><span class="line">75</span><br><span class="line">76</span><br><span class="line">77</span><br><span class="line">78</span><br><span class="line">79</span><br><span class="line">80</span><br><span class="line">81</span><br><span class="line">82</span><br><span class="line">83</span><br><span class="line">84</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">&lt;!DOCTYPE <span class="keyword">html</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">html</span> <span class="attr">lang</span>=<span class="string">&quot;en&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">head</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">meta</span> <span class="attr">charset</span>=<span class="string">&quot;UTF-8&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">meta</span> <span class="attr">name</span>=<span class="string">&quot;viewport&quot;</span> <span class="attr">content</span>=<span class="string">&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">title</span>&gt;</span>信号！中央财经委会议披露了几个重要信息<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">title</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;1.png&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">a</span> <span class="attr">href</span>=<span class="string">&quot;https://news.sina.com.cn/china/&quot;</span> <span class="attr">target</span>=<span class="string">&quot;_blank&quot;</span>&gt;</span>国内新闻<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">a</span>&gt;</span>&gt;正文</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">h1</span>&gt;</span>信号！中央财经委会议披露了几个重要信息<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">h1</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">hr</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> 2023年07月21日 07:01 <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">a</span> <span class="attr">href</span>=<span class="string">&quot;https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzA5NTY5MzUxMQ==&amp;mid=2651116854&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=b3abce953450cf6e55e7356693a3eeb0&amp;chksm=8b4b0a9ebc3c8388df72aa14016837449c33c15ea27b337155666bc26137b114224395ce7f24&quot;</span> <span class="attr">target</span>=<span class="string">&quot;_blank&quot;</span>&gt;</span>北京青年报<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">a</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">hr</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="language-css"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="selector-tag">a</span>&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="attribute">color</span>: black;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="attribute">text-decoration</span>: none;<span class="comment">/* 去除超链接的下划线 */</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="selector-tag">p</span>&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="attribute">text-indent</span>: <span class="number">35px</span>; <span class="comment">/* 段落首行缩进 */</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="attribute">line-height</span>: <span class="number">20px</span>;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="selector-id">#ckk</span>&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> <span class="attribute">text-align</span>: right;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> </span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="language-css"> </span><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">style</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">head</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">body</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">h4</span> <span class="attr">align</span>=<span class="string">&quot;center&quot;</span>&gt;</span>撰文 | 余晖<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">h4</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>7月20日的《新闻联播》头条,是中央财经委员会第二次会议。上一次中央财经委开会,是在两个多月前(5月5日)。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>这次会议研究加强耕地保护和盐碱地综合改造利用等问题。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;1.jpg&quot;</span> <span class="attr">id</span>=<span class="string">&quot;Lzj&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>几个细节值得关注。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>第一，这两次中央财经委的会议，都听取了相关汇报。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>中央财经委的第一次会议，议题包括“研究加快建设现代化产业体系问题”“研究以人口高质量发展支撑中国式现代化问题”。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>那次会议，听取了国家发展改革委、科技部、工业和信息化部、农业农村部等的汇报。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>中央财经委的第二次会议，听取了<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span>自然资源部、农业农村部、中央财办（中央农办）、国家发展改革委<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span>关于加强耕地保护和盐碱地综合改造利用的汇报。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>上述几个部门中，自然资源部、农业农村部、国家发展改革委是国务院组成部门。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>“中央财办（中央农办）”这样的表述，在之前并不常见。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;2.jpg&quot;</span> <span class="attr">alt</span>=<span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">h4</span> <span class="attr">align</span>=<span class="string">&quot;center&quot;</span>&gt;</span>截图来自新华网<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">h4</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>根据2018年机构改革方案,<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>中央财办是中央财经领导小组的办事机构<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>2018年,根据农业农村部三定方案，<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>中央农村工作领导小组办公室设在农业农村部<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，接受中央农村工作领导小组的直接领导。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>2021年8月,十九届中央财经委员会第十次会议曾听取中央农办的汇报，当时的表述是“会议听取了国家发展改革委、财政部、人力资源和社会保障部、<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>中央农办<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>关于扎实推动共同富裕问题的汇报”。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;3.jpg&quot;</span> <span class="attr">alt</span>=<span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>第二，中央对耕地问题作了最新判断。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>会议肯定了十八大以来的相关举措，称“守住了耕地红线，初步遏制了耕地总量持续下滑趋势”。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>同时，会议还作了最新判断：<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>我国人多地少的国情<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>没有变<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，耕地“非粮化”、“非农化”问题<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>依然突出<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，守住耕地红线的基础<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>尚不稳固<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，农田水利方面<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>欠账还很多<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>新时代新征程上，耕地保护任务<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>没有减轻<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，而是更加艰巨。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>会议要求，必须坚持问题导向、目标导向，尊重规律、因势利导、因地制宜、久久为功，<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>进一步<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>加强耕地保护。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>第三，这次会议，<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>再度强调<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>“确保18亿亩耕地红线决不突破”。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>政知君了解到,2006年,“十一五”规划纲要中首次提出18亿亩耕地是一个具有法律效力的约束性指标,是不可逾越的一道红线。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>自此，坚守耕地红线开始逐步成为国家各类开发建设活动的刚性要求之一。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>高层关注耕地保护问题的背后，有一个不得不正视的事实是，即保饭碗的耕地数量正在减少，局部质量也在变差。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>2022年,《经济日报》曾发布了耕地问题调查一文。文中提到了一组数据：<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>1957年至1996年,我国耕地年均净减少超过600万亩;<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>1996年至2008年,年均净减少超过1000万亩;<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>2009年至2019年,年均净减少超过1100万亩。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>这一趋势反映在人均耕地面积上是,一调(第一次全国土地调查)为1.59亩、二调1.52亩、三调1.36亩。现有耕地19.18亿亩，<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>如果以这样的速度减少<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>,10年后可能会突破18亿亩红线。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">img</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;4.jpg&quot;</span> <span class="attr">alt</span>=<span class="string">&quot;&quot;</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>这次中央财经委第二次会议再度明确：<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>要压实耕地保护责任，落实新一轮国土空间规划明确的耕地和永久基本农田保护任务,<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>确保18亿亩耕地红线决不突破<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>会议还提到，要全力提升耕地质量，真正把耕地特别是永久基本农田建成适宜耕作、旱涝保收、高产稳产的<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>现代化良田<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>会议还提到：<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>要<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>调动农民和地方政府保护耕地、种粮抓粮积极性<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，建立种粮农民收益保障机制，发展多种形式的适度规模经营，建立粮食主产区利益补偿机制，形成粮食主产区、主销区、产销平衡区耕地保护合力。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span>加强撂荒地治理，摸清底数<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span>，分类推进，因地制宜把撂荒地种好用好。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>要积极开发各类非传统耕地资源，加强科技研发和生产投资，探索有效发展模式，<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>突破我国传统耕地稀缺的自然条件限制<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>对违规占用耕地进行整改复耕要实事求是，尊重规律，保护农民利益，加强宣传解读，适当留出过渡期，循序渐进推动。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>第五，这次会议还聚焦了“盐碱地综合改造利用”。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>政知君注意到，中央对盐碱地综合利用问题一直十分关注。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>就在今年5月,习近平在河北考察时，曾考察了黄骅市旧城镇仙庄片区旱碱地麦田，了解盐碱地整治、旱碱麦种植推广及产业化情况。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>习近平指出,<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>开展盐碱地综合利用，是一个战略问题，必须摆上重要位置<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>7月20日召开的中央财经委第二次会议提到,我国盐碱地多，部分地区耕地盐碱化趋势加剧，开展盐碱地综合改造利用意义重大。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>会议还特别提到了几个要求：<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>要充分挖掘盐碱地综合利用潜力，加强现有盐碱耕地改造提升，有效遏制耕地盐碱化趋势，做好盐碱地特色农业大文章。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>要<span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>全面摸清盐碱地资源状况，研究编制盐碱地综合利用总体规划和专项实施方案<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">b</span>&gt;</span>，分区分类开展盐碱耕地治理改良，因地制宜利用盐碱地，向各类盐碱地资源要食物，“以种适地”同“以地适种”相结合，加快选育耐盐碱特色品种，大力推广盐碱地治理改良的有效做法，强化水源、资金等要素保障。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span>政知君注意到，这次会议审议通过了《关于推动盐碱地综合利用的指导意见》。<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">audio</span> <span class="attr">src</span>=<span class="string">&quot;6.mflac&quot;</span> <span class="attr">controls</span>&gt;</span><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">audio</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">br</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span>资料 | 新华社 人民网 央视 经济日报 学习时报<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">strong</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag">&lt;<span class="name">p</span> <span class="attr">id</span>=<span class="string">&quot;ckk&quot;</span>&gt;</span>责任编辑：刘德宾<span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">p</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">body</span>&gt;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="tag">&lt;/<span class="name">html</span>&gt;</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>借用的图片：</p> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202307212028089.png" alt="1"></p> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202307212028102.jpg" alt="2"></p> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202307212028106.jpg" alt="3"></p> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202307212028110.jpg" alt="4"></p> <p><img data-src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chulianyuang/imap/202307212028161.jpg" alt="1"></p>
